name: Faculty of Technical Sciences, University of Novi Sad
goal: The Faculty of Technical Sciences[a] (abbr. FTN; Serbian: Факултет техничких наука Универзитета у Новом Саду / Fakultet tehničkih nauka Univerziteta u Novom Sadu) is a higher education institution located in Novi Sad, an independent part of the University of Novi Sad. It was founded in 1960 and today, with about 1200 employees and almost 14,000 students, is the largest faculty in the region. Until now, 90 study programs for academic and professional studies have been accredited.
interests: Education and training, Energy, Environment, Food Safety, Research and innovation
euInitiatives:
European Commission Annual Work Programme and Roadmaps
Research and innovation
Horizon 2020
